    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Constructor of the board. Board is a 8x8 matrix. Check and checkmate are initialized to false.

      • setPedine

        public final void setPedine(Pedine pedina,
             int newX,
             int newY)
        Set a new pedine in the board. If the pedine is a pawn and reaches the end, provides to change pedine.
        Parameters:
        pedina - Pedine to set
        newX - New coordinate x of the pedine
        newY - new coordinate y of the pedine

      • move

        public final boolean move(Board scacchiera,
           Pedine pedinaMossa,
           int newX,
           int newY)
        Function that checks if the move is allowed. if it is, it sets the movement and sets check and checkmate.
        Parameters:
        scacchiera - Matrix on which I am working
        pedinaMossa - Pedine that has to be moved
        newX - Coordinate x where the pedine has to be moved
        newY - Coordinate y where the pedine has to be moved
        Returns:
        Returns if the move was done or not
